attributes.comment:
If you are going to increase fees related to required documents for foreign
adoption, please change the expiration on these documents to at least two (2)
years from initial filing. With the wait time increasing in China, those families (this
family is one of them and is refiling and repaying fees now) adopting from China
are having to refile I600As and redo fingerprints even though nothing has changed
in their lives and their homestudies are still valid. Most homestudies are good for
two years, so the one would think the USCIS documents should also be good for
two years. This would save the USCIS offices valuable time and resources.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
